description: Indentex is an indentation-based superset of LaTeX. An Indentex source file is more concise and visually less cluttered than an equivalent LaTeX file. Its indentation-based syntax was inspired by Python. Transpiling an Indentex source file yields a plain LaTeX file, which can be used further in your toolchain, sent to a publisher or your colleagues.
summary: A transpiler for an indentation-based superset of LaTeX.
author: Mikhail Pak,  Hans Kirchner
